rows.title: Deserialize JSON into C# dynamic object?

610: <p>For that I would use JSON.NET to do the low-level parsing of the JSON stream and then build up the object hierarchy out of instances of the <code>ExpandoObject</code> class.</p>
<p>The object you want DynamicJSONObject is included in the System.Web.Helpers.dll from the ASP.NET Web Pages package, which is part of WebMatrix.</p>
